scenario_text.value:
(We won somehow...but there are still some
enemies left.)
(We have to beat them—huh?)

(What the— The floor’s shining?
Something’s happening here...)

Something like a magic circle’s floating
up... What the heck is this?!

All of those Kenzoku were taken out by
a single attack.
What power...

Who dares disturb my slumber...?
Oh, I see you have human children with you.
Who...who are you?

Curious... How many years has it been since a
human came here? Fifty years...no, hundreds?
Now, then... Shall I slaughter you all?!
Whoa whoa whoa, wait a minute!
(How do I handle this?!)
We’re not your enemy!
We’re not with them!
We were being chased!
Not your enemy!
Wait, we’re not your enemy!
It ain’t listening! Waaah, here it comes!
Not with them!
Wait, we’re not with them!

You tryin’ to have a chit-chat NOW?! Here it
comes!
Just being chased!
We were being chased and just ended up here!
Waaah, wait, hold on a sec! Yeeek!
